snippet: Russia’s most prominent political prisoner, Mikhail B. Khodorkovsky, was granted a review in a lower court at a time when other activists are being prosecuted.
abstract: Russia's Supreme Court issues a rare ruling in favor of the jailed oil tycoon Mikhail B Khodorkovsky, requiring a lower court to review a pivotal aspect of his long legal odyssey, which has tarred the reputation of the judicial system for many Russians; ruling comes amid signs of a broadening campaign to prosecute opposition politicians and activists.
lead_paragraph: Russia’s most prominent political prisoner, Mikhail B. Khodorkovsky, was granted a review in a lower court at a time when other activists are being prosecuted.

headline.seo: Russian Court Issues Favorable Ruling to Oil Tycoon
headline.main: Amid Political Prosecutions, Russian Court Issues Ruling Favorable to Oil Tycoon
headline.print_headline: Amid Political Prosecutions, Russian Court Issues Ruling Favorable to Oil Tycoon
